title: URGENCY
text: Emergency and urgent matters require immediate attention. For medical emergencies call 15 (SAMU) or 112. For dental emergencies, same-day slots are available between 11h-12h and 15h-16h. For property emergencies (water leak, electrical failure), call the 24/7 emergency number. urgent urgence emergency immediate critical ASAP now tout de suite immédiat danger help aide

title: PRICING
text: VocalIA offers competitive and transparent pricing. Our voice solutions are significantly more affordable than market alternatives, with savings of up to 60%. Contact sales for detailed pricing tailored to your business needs. price pricing cost tarif prix how much combien fee charge budget devis estimate

title: HOURS
text: Operating hours vary by business type. Most services operate Monday-Friday 9h-18h. Some offer Saturday hours. 24/7 services include emergency hotlines and automated voice assistants. Check specific business hours in the knowledge base. hours horaires open ouvert close fermé when quand schedule disponible available

title: CONTACT
text: Contact VocalIA via website vocalia.ma or phone +212 6 00 00 00 00. For technical support, email support@vocalia.ma. Business inquiries go to contact@vocalia.ma. Response time is typically within 24 business hours. contact phone telephone email reach joindre appeler call message write

title: DATA PRIVACY
text: VocalIA is GDPR compliant. We use privacy-first analytics with no cookies. Customer data is encrypted with enterprise-grade security. Voice interactions are processed in real-time with full data isolation. Data requests can be submitted to privacy@vocalia.ma. privacy GDPR data donnees protection confidential secure security encryption cookies

title: REFUND
text: Refund and return policies vary by merchant. Standard e-commerce offers 30-day returns for unused items in original packaging. Digital services may have different terms. Contact the specific merchant for their return policy details. refund return remboursement retour exchange échange cancel annuler money back

title: BOOKING
text: Appointment booking is available through multiple channels: voice assistant, online calendar, phone call, or messaging. Bookings require name, contact info, preferred date/time, and service type. Confirmation is sent via SMS or email. Cancellations should be made 24h in advance. book booking appointment rdv rendez-vous schedule reserve réserver slot créneau calendar

title: DELIVERY
text: Delivery options include standard (3-5 business days, free over 50€), express (1-2 days, 15€), and same-day for select areas. Real-time tracking via SMS link. If absent, packages go to nearest pickup point. Contact logistics for international shipping. delivery livraison shipping ship track suivi colis package transport receive

title: PAYMENT
text: Accepted payment methods include Visa, Mastercard, Amex, PayPal, and Apple Pay. Secure payment processing is handled with enterprise-grade encryption. Payment links and invoices are available. Installment plans (3-4x sans frais) offered by some merchants. payment paiement pay payer card carte visa mastercard paypal invoice facture

title: LANGUAGE SUPPORT
text: VocalIA supports 5 languages: French (FR), English (EN), Spanish (ES), Arabic (AR/MSA), and Moroccan Darija (ARY). Language is auto-detected or can be specified. All personas have full multilingual translations. language langue french english arabic darija spanish translate traduction multilingual
